text: Alicia Silverstone ’ s son had an unexpected takeaway from her 1995 cult classic Clueless. The actress, who played lovable movie heroine Cher Horowitz, took Bear, 7, to a screening of the movie at an L. A. cemetery. “ There were 4, 000 people and this huge screen outdoors at night, in a cemetery, very romantic, and there were pillows and rosé, ” Silverstone, 42, recalled during a Monday, June 11, appearance on The Late Show with Stephen Colbert. Bear didn ’ t walk away singing “ Rollin ’ With the Homies. ” Or quoting classic lines from the film.
